0110111010110010 0010110110000110 1 -> sum: 1001110000111001, cout: 0

1001111101010011 1000110101001100 1 -> sum: 0010110010100000, cout: 1
1100110101111001 1001110011011011 1 -> sum: 0110101001010101, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
